front.title: Organization Extension for the Extensible Provisioning Protocol (EPP)

abstract.t: This mapping, an extension to EPP object mappings like the EPP domain name mapping [RFC5731], to support assigning an organization to any existing object (domain, host, contact) as well as any future objects. Specified in Extensible Markup Language (XML), this extended mapping is applied to provide additional features required for the provisioning of organizations.
